reviews.review: Una secuela casi perfecta. Toma todo lo del primero y lo mejora dando una historia muy interesante y un dise√±o de puzles sublime. Recomendad√≠simo.
This game is amazing but I almost punched my monitors at the easiest tests so obviously I wasn't meant to play this game. But still if you're smart then play this game üëç
One of my alltime favourites; It has it¬¥s own mystical "Half-Life" atmosphere which makes this game so very special. After playing this game you¬¥ll be able to think in portals :)

i think this game is the best story game ever i have beaten it 3 times and played lots of online maps i tried finding Easter eggs in the game and it is fun 10/10. There are also many mods for the game. you should try this game. next i will try speed running the game.
i have a cave jhonson body pillow

This is a fantastic play. The story gives just enough for you to be engaged, but keeps its little secrets for you to discover on your own. The humor is top-tier, and has not aged a day. Excellent voice-acting on all of the characters. Co-op is fun too. Excited for more games from Valve in the future.

[spoiler]I kind of wish there was a way to not have to strand Wheatley at the moon since I really liked his character.[/spoiler]

I swear, the Portal series is the only series that can make every character technically a villain and still make them both hilarious and likable as characters
Portal 2 is a fun and enjoyable game. It has a good emersive feel to it. And I would really recommend getting both Portal and Portal 2 for the best experience.

Ok just finished the game. Definitely became one of my favorite games. Writing is funny, gameplay is amazing, voice acting is once again good. However, no cake at the end. 
0/10 would not play again.
GLADoS is such a complex villain with hilarious snark. the game is worth playing just for her
just beautiful amazing awesome loved it
A perfectly designed and executed experience...

I mean yeah, what can I say that hasn't already been discussed? I would argue that Portal 2 is the last best fps game Valve  ever made, excluding csgo (cause ya'll are toxic, free to play trash <3 (no hate ily.)). Half-Life Alyx is an fps, but is more of a vr tech demo than anything.
un bon jeu avec des amis et aussi si vous aimer les casse tete ses votre jeu

Stupendo! Ambientazione bellissima, storia molto accattivante. Ottima ripresa della storia del primo capitolo con tanti colpi di scena. Logica di gioco simile a The Talos Principle, ma con uno humor meraviglioso alla Borderlands. Grafica veramente bella. Semplicemente senzazionale per chi ama il genere.
Uno de los mejores juegos jamas creados, adictivo, carismatico e infinitamente rejugable
Im going to burn your house down with lemonade
